channel.title: World's Without Number - Skyler
channel.generator: Webpage HTML Export plugin for Obsidian

item.title: Boris Martikov
item.description: Freelance contractor of Collective Industries

item.title: Cross Payne
item.description: Freelance contractor of Collective Industries

item.title: Fo'Rong
item.description: Freelance contractor of Collective Industries

item.title: Frank 'Big' Poppa
item.description: Freelance contractor of Collective Industries

item.title: Graham
item.description:
First Black Market Contact that I know
Blonde, pomadour, muscular man
Like Jonny Bravo but gold mechanical left arm
Works with the Ono Family

Day drinking at bar Lesso - just hanging out
Boris Martikov tried to armwrestle him and lost

item.title: Max
item.description: Local wizard who helps us identify things

item.title: Ono Family
item.description:
Crime family
but not criminals?
Sponsor we could have done
Funnel magic weapons into Bastion City through discrete routes

item.title: Session 6-17
item.description:
Not getting a house right away. We don't want to pay rent right away!
So when we come back, we get a house
Go to Saltberry. Didn't find anything crazy. Going through, along the river to find them
Found waterfall, see a random rusted sword? come from behind the waterfall
We went behind the waterfall, there's a big 'ol dungeon!
Tried to convince the lizardfolk in the dungeon that we are there to trade. They didn't believe me.
Fought a bunch of lizards, chased one down. After fighting the lizards Cross Payne found some sword blades. They glow and are slightly magical. Labeled 2 and 9.
Remy Lafoe - impaled in the dungeon by sword 8! also a vampire!
Hierophant, high priest to god of swords Gladio.
Remy originally wanted to taste blood of a god. However Hierophant too powerful.
We walked into a room with a ton of lizards
GONNA DIE

item.title: Session 7-1
item.description:
We killed all the lizardmen in the room
We found a fully functioning flask-sword - this is the greatest invention
As I pulled a spear out of a giant dead body, it came back to life and tried to attack us
Fo'Rong took the spear from my hands and fucking demolished it in 1 turn
It's his spear now

Cathedral chamber
Swords emerging from a pit
Weird structure with swords coming from it. It starts shaking
These weird animated sword armor things are begging for death and charging us
I shot them all
Found another sword piece on top of the pile - Part 6

By Gladio's power, any object offered will find it's edge

Cross Payne found part 7 on the throne

We found Gladio making swords in the dungeon.
Fo'Rong made a pact with Gladio to make a super cool punch sword
He's required to kill 9 people with 9 swords in 2 weeks? that or 9 days idk

item.title: Session 7-17
item.description:
Went behind thrones and found a ghost crying and asking for forgiveness
Couldn't do anything to her
Boris Martikov "forgave" her and she smiled and disappeared
She had a ring of swords - it's mine now
Also got some crowns and a scepter for monies
Whiskey sword - Garison the Harvester

After exploring more, we found a room being guarded by lizardfolk claiming their new god was going to be born.
We killed the guards. We entered the room and there was a BIG ole egg. Fo'Rong punched the egg and the baby started crying and cracking the egg. We escaped the room, closed the door, and the baby killed all of the extra lizardfolk in the room. It escaped the room soon after and Boris Martikov and Frank 'Big' Poppa shot it in the face with their shotguns to take it down.
Found Sword number 1

item.title: Session 8-12
item.description:
Frank 'Big' Poppa and Fo'Rong had an existential talk about how if they killed a cat person with the puzzle sword whether or not that would count as nine kills. We had only heard of lion people so that might have to go in the folder.
Boris Martikov grabs Sword Number 4 from a bed chamber room we found

Walking through the dungeon we stumbled upon some mermaids playing water polo.
Fo'Rong and Frank 'Big' Poppa debated on how to tackle the situation. Frank finally decided to just talk to the mermaids.
Met Johnny who told us about The Riptides and the Queen who had a piece of the Puzzle Sword
After convincing Octagon (see Johnny) to allow us to see the Queen, we talked to her and Boris Martikov was able to convince her to trade the piece of the Puzzle Sword for spreading the tale of The Riptides water polo team and making them more famous so they can go international

We go see Gladio. He unlocks the potential of the Puzzle Sword and shows us the power of the greatsword.
He's mean to Frank 'Big' Poppa =(
Gave us the "Pommel" Stick it in a dead body and turn the knob and it will open a door to whatever door we are thinking of

item.title: Collective Industries
item.description:
Gives us jobs
1st Job
Sent to lighthouse to figure out what is happening
2nd Job
Saxophone blades flowing done a river. Go figure out and get item that makes them
After going to Saltberry found out that the blades are super random

item.title: Johnny
item.description:
Mermaid that we met in the sword dungeon
Told us that the Queen has one of the puzzle swords. We could either play them in water polo and they would take us or convince a girl called Octagon to take us.

item.title: Lesso
item.description:
Bar Graham hangs out at
Has a see-through backroom that Graham uses to make shady deals
He claims that divination magic can't see into it and that it is soundproof

item.title: Main Notes
item.description:
Royal Family of Omare's
King Omare of Luranne goods
Year 1367!

item.title: Puzzle Sword
item.description:
9 part sword thats kind of like a key
Part Check
1 [Y] - found after killing godling
2 [Y] - found in lobby of dungeon
3 [Y] - received from Mermaid queen in exchange for spreading the tale of The Riptides and getting them into international play of water polo
4 [Y] - found in bed chamber
5 [Y] - found wielded by eternally fighting sand warriors. traded for random sword
6 [Y] - found on top of pile after fighting sword armor
7 [Y] - found on the throne
8 [Y] - found impaled in Remy Lafoe
9 [Y] - found in lobby of dungeon
AKA The Nine of Swords

item.title: Remy Lafoe
item.description:
Vampire trapped in the dungeon from Session 6-17
Owns a vineyard from a few years ago that is probably taken over by now
Became a vampire like 80 years ago

item.title: Saltberry
item.description:
Town that sells saltberries
They are kind of like salted berries. They suck though
Going to talk to fishermen, near berry picking
Fisherman looking for swords
He found one that wasn't a saxophone. Didn't want it? Found one that is screaming?
A knight rode through a few weeks ago.
